programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana»Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized so starts to change the way things are done in the Brown's house. When will he leave? // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices and calls PC Wells but Mrs. Bird turns it into a cake! What will he do?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost) S1 (21/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost»Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardin de Peppa et George) S4 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardin de Peppa et George»Granpa Pig comes for a visit and brings Peppa and George seeds for a flower garden. They plant them, but birds want to eat them. Daddy Pig must help out with scaring the birds away. Soon beautiful flowers grow out in the garden, and one of them is taller than the house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vétérinaire volante) S4 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La vétérinaire volante»The Flying Vet: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Kylie Kangeroo) S5 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Kylie Kangeroo»Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Dog) S4 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Dog»Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les Amis du goût) S5 (n°519)
programme.desc: «Les Amis du goût»When Chefs Molly and Gil bring their tasty food truck to Bland Land, they discover that the Baron von Bland only lets his subjects eat Bland Bread! Yuck! The Chefs must find a way to bring taste to the kingdom!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'arc-en-ciel de Blue) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «L'arc-en-ciel de Blue»We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et le Carton Passe-Partout) S2 (18/21)
programme.desc: «Blue et le Carton Passe-Partout»Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia) S2 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia»When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Triton's Trumpet) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Triton's Trumpet»Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire»Baby Mayor: The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best in Flow) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Best in Flow»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une chatte citadine / Du surf en plein ciel) S4 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Une chatte citadine / Du surf en plein ciel»Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington vend Bessie) S2 (18/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington vend Bessie»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Un trou dans la route) S3 (26/52)
programme.desc: «Un trou dans la route»Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Freddy Fox) S3 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Freddy Fox»Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Apprendre à siffler) S3 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Apprendre à siffler»Peppa tente d'apprendre à siffler. Elle réalise que tout le monde y parvient sauf elle...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (49/78)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (50/78)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête costumée de Blue) S1 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La fête costumée de Blue»Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le courrier du facteur / Le puits à souhaits) S4 (20/26)
programme.desc: «Le courrier du facteur / Le puits à souhaits»The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Cochon surfeur) S3 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Le Cochon surfeur»Zuma is on a wacky water rescue after Cornelius the pig goes for a ride on a windsurfing board.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal»Candy floss clouds cause confusion in 'Every Cloud', and then in 'Rainbow Comet Rush', can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? (S2, ep 11).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector) S1 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector»It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau»Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza in 'Snowball Bonanza', and in 'The Present', Baby Shark goes undercover to get the perfect gift for Mummy Shark. (S1, ep 15).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Détective Baby Shark»Detective Baby Shark: When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Funny Sounds) S1 (46/78)
programme.desc: «Funny Sounds»Silly Sounds: When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. (S1, ep 46).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (51/78)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»The Amazing Guesser: After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! (S1, ep 51).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (7/78)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (8/78)
programme.desc: «The Nap»The Nap: Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep! (S1, ep 8).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (9/78)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! (S1, ep 10).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster) S3 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster»C'est l'anniversaire de Peppa. Tous ses amis sont invités à la fête. Papa Cochon s'apprête à faire un show extraordinaire pour l'occasion.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»La famille de Peppa organise une excursion à la mer afin de bâtir des châteaux de sable sur la plage, mais à leur arrivée, il y a de la neige...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Maman Pig donne son vieil ordinateur à Granny et Grandpa Pig, mais sauront-ils s'en servir ?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa et ses amis de la garderie accompagnent madame Gazelle à l'hôpital pour rendre une visite à Pedro, qui a une jambe cassée...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig places a large order of plastic gnomes and a wishing well for the garden, Peppa and George love them but Grandpa Pig is not happy. He wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Big Bad Hen) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «The Big Bad Hen»The Big Bad Hen: Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard. (S1, ep 17b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les jeux du flocon) S7 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Les jeux du flocon»It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Place à l'ambulance) S7 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Place à l'ambulance»When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint) S4 (17/26)
programme.desc: «La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint»Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bulles à gogo) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Bulles à gogo»Sir Steel's attempts to clean up the Central Forest with a giant soap machine creates a huge bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana»Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized so starts to change the way things are done in the Brown's house. When will he leave? // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices and calls PC Wells but Mrs. Bird turns it into a cake! What will he do?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost) S1 (21/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost»Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.desc: «Le jardin de Peppa et George»Granpa Pig comes for a visit and brings Peppa and George seeds for a flower garden. They plant them, but birds want to eat them. Daddy Pig must help out with scaring the birds away. Soon beautiful flowers grow out in the garden, and one of them is taller than the house.

programme.desc: «La vétérinaire volante»The Flying Vet: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.desc: «Kylie Kangeroo»Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Dog) S4 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Dog»Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.desc: «Les Amis du goût»When Chefs Molly and Gil bring their tasty food truck to Bland Land, they discover that the Baron von Bland only lets his subjects eat Bland Bread! Yuck! The Chefs must find a way to bring taste to the kingdom!

programme.desc: «L'arc-en-ciel de Blue»We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.desc: «Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia»When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Triton's Trumpet) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Triton's Trumpet»Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire»Baby Mayor: The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best in Flow) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Best in Flow»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une chatte citadine / Du surf en plein ciel) S4 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Une chatte citadine / Du surf en plein ciel»Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington vend Bessie) S2 (18/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington vend Bessie»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy et Peppa fondent un club secret. Elles envisagent de partir en missions secrètes et de faire des activités confidentielles. Bientôt tout les autres veulent les rejoindre...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Le bateau de Papy Pig vient de couler, aussi Papy Chien les emmène au chantier naval de Papy Rabbit où il pourra être réparé...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle donne une leçon de musique à ses élèves. Il s'en suit une joyeuse cacophonie mais des grandes personnes arrivent et les choses s'arragent...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (53/78)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (54/78)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Surprise Box) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Blue's Surprise Box»It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day, and Blue is making YOU something very special. While we play Blue's Clues to figure out what she's making, we help Slippery finish his Love Day Cards and help cheer up our sad Heart Friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (François et le bébé Gorfou / Le Hippo rodéo de Danny) S4 (24/26)
programme.desc: «François et le bébé Gorfou / Le Hippo rodéo de Danny»Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap) S2 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap»Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Welcome Wagon) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Welcome Wagon»Welcome Wagon: When Baby's new neighbour doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind. (S1, ep 25b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (52/78)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (57/78)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Magic Trick: Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! (S1, ep 57).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (11/78)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»The Cuddle Toy: Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher loses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies! (S1, ep 11).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (12/78)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Shooting Star) S1 (13/78)
programme.desc: «Shooting Star»Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favourite circus show does not work. So the others create their own circus acts in the backyard instead. (S1, ep 14).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cours de gymnastique) S3 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le cours de gymnastique»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La poterie) S3 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La poterie»Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le spectacle de Noël de Monsieur Patate) S4 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le spectacle de Noël de Monsieur Patate»Mr Potato's Christmas Show: It's Christmas time! The Playgroup are going to see a special performance at the theatre. For some it is their first time in a theatre.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo?) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo?»Where Did It Go Barbabravo?: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Camion postier Blaze) S7 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Camion postier Blaze»When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (A la poursuite des tortues / La nouvelle machine à tondre) S4 (21/26)
programme.desc: «A la poursuite des tortues / La nouvelle machine à tondre»Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs./Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille Sauve Luke Stars / La Pat' Patrouille sauve Galinetta) S4 (23/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille Sauve Luke Stars / La Pat' Patrouille sauve Galinetta»Katie is going to perform her contest winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!
